title: Firestore Task Document Schema
description: Schema for a task document in the Firestore 'tasks' collection of the ToDo app.

completed.description: Indicates whether the task is completed.

created.description: Timestamp of when the task was created.

title.description: Title or short summary of the task.

user.description: Firestore document reference path to the user who owns this task. Example: /users/J7ls7XnVKuUtUn6Cebe7NHmURCt2
